Initializer# init(achievementID:)

Creates a view controller that presents an achievement.iOS 14.0+iPadOS 14.0+Mac Catalyst 14.0+macOS 11.0+tvOS 14.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
@MainActor
init(achievementID: String)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/GameKit/GKGameCenterViewController/init(achievementID:)#parameters)

`achievementID`The identifier for the achievement to display.

## [Return Value](/documentation/GameKit/GKGameCenterViewController/init(achievementID:)#return-value)

The initialized view controller.

## [See Also](/documentation/GameKit/GKGameCenterViewController/init(achievementID:)#see-also)

### [Configuring Game Center content](/documentation/GameKit/GKGameCenterViewController/init(achievementID:)#Configuring-Game-Center-content)

[`init(state: GKGameCenterViewControllerState)`](/documentation/gamekit/gkgamecenterviewcontroller/init(state:))Creates a view controller that presents the specified Game Center content.[`enum GKGameCenterViewControllerState`](/documentation/gamekit/gkgamecenterviewcontrollerstate)The type of content for the view controller to present.[`init(leaderboard: GKLeaderboard, playerScope: GKLeaderboard.PlayerScope)`](/documentation/gamekit/gkgamecenterviewcontroller/init(leaderboard:playerscope:))Creates a view controller that presents a leaderboard with data for the specified players.[`init(leaderboardID: String, playerScope: GKLeaderboard.PlayerScope, timeScope: GKLeaderboard.TimeScope)`](/documentation/gamekit/gkgamecenterviewcontroller/init(leaderboardid:playerscope:timescope:))Creates a view controller that presents a leaderboard with data from the specified players and time period.[`init(leaderboardSetID: String)`](/documentation/gamekit/gkgamecenterviewcontroller/init(leaderboardsetid:))Creates a view controller that presents a leaderboard set.[`init(player: GKPlayer)`](/documentation/gamekit/gkgamecenterviewcontroller/init(player:))Creates a view controller that presents a playerâ€™s Game Center profile.
